Description:
Technical lead and escalation point for advance application support on incidents and requests.
Take ownership of application troubleshooting tasks such as, but not limited to; server O/S issues and application analysis.
Provide support, maintain, and configure server and application infrastructure that supports standards and procedures.
Monitor and develop reporting on the performance of server and application infrastructure against KPI's and/org SLA's. Take preemptive measures to minimize interruptions and meet agreed upon objectives.
Coordinate and manage collaboration with infrastructure staff, IT Department teams, and organization to ensure smooth and reliable operation of hardware and software infrastructure.
Plan and install of server hardware and software, storage networking, and backup hardware and software as required per lifecycle planning, UWCU facility growth, or other business or technology drivers.
Be an ongoing leader in the change processes as any/all production changes are planned and implemented.
Ensure all production installations are thoroughly tested to ensure quality deployments, and when pre-testing is not possible, ensure all peers and IT leadership are aware of the risks and are involved in the decision to proceed or not.
Develop and support the policies and procedures for accessing and working within the UWCU Data Centers.Job Details
